botcomponent.description:
This capability creates a new order record in the 'cr039_orders' table with specified order details. For cr039_deliverystatus map values to logical names using this mapping: 0: Pending
For statecode map values to logical names using this mapping: 0: Active 1: Inactive
For statuscode map values to logical names using this mapping: 1: Active 2: Inactive
For statecode map values to logical names using this mapping: 0: Active 1: Inactive
For statuscode map values to logical names using this mapping: 1: Active 2: Inactive
botcomponent.name: Create new order record in organization orders table
